resourceTemplates.name: edenai-prompts-list
resourceTemplates.title: List Eden AI Prompts
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all prompts saved in Eden AI.

resourceTemplates.name: edenai-prompts-get
resourceTemplates.title: Get Eden AI Prompt
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves details of a specific prompt by name from Eden AI.

resourceTemplates.name: edenai-prompts-history-list
resourceTemplates.title: List Eden AI Prompt History
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves the execution history of a specific prompt in Eden AI.

resourceTemplates.name: edenai-prompts-history-get
resourceTemplates.title: Get Eden AI Prompt History Item
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves a specific execution record of a prompt by its history ID.

resourceTemplates.name: edenai-prompts-template-variables
resourceTemplates.title: Get Eden AI Prompt Template Variables
resourceTemplates.description: Fetches the template variables used in a specific prompt execution.
